programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.sub-title: GPs Behind Closed Doors: Best of Patient Files.
programme.desc: A patient offers an insight into his ongoing battle with alcoholism, which has led to divorce, personal injury and mental health problems. Elsewhere, a young woman who became paralysed from the chest down after an accident shares her story, and a married couple with learning difficulties discuss how they are there to support each other. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Highland Midwife
programme.desc: New series. Documentary series taking viewers to the unforgiving surrounds of the Scottish Highlands, following three expectant mothers and the professionals who attend them. In the opening episode, first-time mum Bridie's hopes for a local birth are threatened when her labour fails to progress, while the sudden arrival of Anastasia's baby necessitates a late-night dash for midwife Morven.(n)

programme.title: Where There's Blame, There's a Claim
programme.desc: A woman who won a huge pay-out from her dentist after a number of botched dental jobs, but is still waiting to receive the money from her claim, despite bailiffs' attempts to recover it. Plus, a young woman who was hit by a falling concrete slab and paralysed from the waist down hopes to settle a seven-figure compensation claim.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the live Big Brother companion show, including a debate on the burning issues and celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: In Sickness and in Wealth: On Benefits.
programme.desc: North West claimants struggling against medical and psychological issues while getting by on benefits. Blackpool martial arts enthusiast Mark hopes to get back into paid employment after being dismissed for breaking a colleague's nose, while Liverpool couple Clive and Sheila want to tie the knot on a benefits budget. Autistic Fleetwood man William struggles to get round due to a bad back and varicose veins. He needs a mobility scooter but has benefits have been cut.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: Inspector Helen saves Turner and Hooch, two Dogues de Bordeaux found abandoned in a garden, while colleague Becky sets off to track down a hound who was spotted stranded in a flood relief channel. Cameras also follow Pepper, a dalmatian who is stealing hearts across Merseyside, and Shih-tzu Olive, who was found in pain on a building site.(n)

programme.title: World's Most Pampered Pets
programme.desc: Part two of two. Following people who spoil their pets, including former TOWIE star Amy Childs, who takes her pug Prince shopping in Essex at her favourite pet boutique. Comedienne Shappi Khorsandi treats her rabbit to a royal grooming session, while New York-based journalist Dara Foster goes with her canine to Fetch Club, a disco for dogs. Plus, a look at Skunkfest masterminded by Deborah Cipriani, which is a yearly gathering for skunk lovers.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: A pink mansion in Edinburgh gets a makeover from Ann Maurice and Alistair Appleton. They attempt to give the garishly painted home a more traditional Scottish feel by having it professionally redecorated and toning down the dark, oppressive wooden ceiling over the hallway.(n)

programme.title: House Busters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis and her team of new-age practitioners suggest ways in which changes to homes could positively affect the lives of their owners.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Mr Grumpy, Mr Rude and Miss Chatterbox try to guess the contents of a secret box, while Mr Fussy and Mr Stubborn test their knowledge of music.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: The rabbit cannot sleep because a dark cloud is covering the moon and the wind is very strong.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The playful piglet makes friends with Emily the elephant.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster is in for a shock after resolving to win all the games she plays. Narrated by Julian Clary.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder, Rubble and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali's train from a landslide.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his team set to work on a new Dinosaur Park attraction, but things take a turn for the worst when Muck's fear of dinosaurs causes a big problem.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Pontypandy Fire Station is opened to the public and Norman is eager to try things out, crawling under safety tape and getting into the driving seat of a fire engine. However, his inquisitive nature and desire for excitement lead to danger when he climbs onto the roof to get closer to Tom and his helicopter.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Percy tries to get to know the wild animals on Sodor, but they are frightened of him and run away.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zac wishes up a cool new carpet, but Zeta gets her hands on it first.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Toyland Mischief Maker.
programme.desc: Big Ears' teapot goes missing and Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. When Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, the little wooden boy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A baby elephant escapes when the circus comes to town, and the Paw Patrol sets out to find the animal.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly goes on a camping trip with Ben and his parents, but the annoying Mr Gnome turns up.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Fizzy is convinced she has turned Grumpy into a giant.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle shows Peppa and her friends how to make a time capsule.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Oscar the orang-utan asks Wissper to help him find his favourite umbrella leaf, but his den is so cluttered she decides it needs a thorough clean-up in order to find anything.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The little rabbit and her friend go in search of dandelions but instead discover a sycamore tree - prompting Alien to play spinning helicopters and use magic to create a giant seat.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Tracy Metro helps a woman in Worcestershire who loves her clothes, but her house needs some attention for buyers to show interest.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: John is desolate after hardly anyone shows up for the fundraiser, but his day is rescued by an unexpected arrival, while Zac is offered a new job in Hunter's home town.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly and Mark enjoy a great day together, and it is clear that they have a developing chemistry. Xanthe suffers another setback, while David faces a moral dilemma.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and the team are perplexed by Hetty's sudden resignation and press Vance and their new team leader Lauren Hunter for more information about what happened to Hetty. Visiting one of her homes for clues, they find mercenaries ransacking the place - and try to track down the man who hired them. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: First Class Fear
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, a woman has a brief affair with a handsome stranger on a plane, which ultimately puts her and everyone else on the flight in danger. Thriller, starring Lacey Chabert, Drew Seeley and Will Kemp. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly and Mark enjoy a great day together, and it is clear that they have a developing chemistry. Xanthe suffers another setback, while David faces a moral dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: John is desolate after hardly anyone shows up for the fundraiser, but his day is rescued by an unexpected arrival, while Zac is offered a new job in Hunter's home town.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: First Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the opening day's play in the First Test, which took place at Lord's. This game marked the start of Yorkshireman Joe Root's tenure as England Test captain, having taken over from Alastair Cook, whose record 59-match captaincy came to an end following the tour of India last winter. With commentary by Graeme Smith, Geoffrey Boycott, Simon Hughes, Michael Vaughan and Mark Nicholas.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Claimants from across the generations, including a 32-year-old former fisherman and his 20-year-old partner who need a bigger home for their five-strong family, and a 57-year-old former welder now struggling to find permanent employment. Plus, a Hastings woman who, after 10 years on the dole, has started to claim her pension and is living comfortably - and now she has a dream of breaking into the music industry.(n)

programme.title: Circus Kids: Our Secret World
programme.desc: New series. Documentary following the lives of children performing in circuses, offering an honest insight into their closely guarded world as they embark on the gruelling season that runs from February to November, seven days a week. The opening episode follows children who were born into a life in the circus, including 17-year-old Peter, and two-year-old twins Esmerelda and Scarlett.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother. Featuring games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, including celebrity fans' thoughts on the latest developments in the run-up to tomorrow's eviction and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband take a cross-country journey to a small coastal town where they bond with its quirky but wise inhabitants(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: A drama centred on three people who are haunted by mortality in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. In search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: Never Die Alone
programme.desc: Rapper-turned-actor DMX is chilling in this intense account of the life and death of a violent drug kingpin. Flashbacks chronicle the life of King David (DMX), who turns out to be more like Goliath when he is knifed by a gangster's young henchman (Michael Ealy). David Arquette costars as an aspiring writer, who inherits audiotapes that detail all of King David's nasty business dealings. Clifton Powell(n)

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: When Abraham Lincoln is assassinated, Union war hero Frederick Aiken is brought in to defend alleged Confederate conspirator, Mary Surrat(n)

programme.title: In America
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a new life is just what Johnny, Sarah and their two plucky daughters need. America might be the land of the free, but without money, New York is fierce and daunting for the young Irish family(n)

programme.title: Ghost World
programme.desc: Two highschool friends,Enid and Rebecca, on the verge of leaving their adolescence behind, try to decide what to do with their lives.Enid discovers a kindred spirit in fellow misfit Seymour, who shares her disgust with the world around them(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Compelling drama starring an Oscar-winning Matthew McConaughey as a macho rodeo cowboy who is diagnosed with HIV(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Michael Clayton (George Clooney) handles all of the dirty work for a major New York law firm, arranging top-flight legal services and skirting through loopholes for ethically questionable clients. But when a fellow "fixer" decides to turn on the very firm they were hired to clean up for, Clayton finds himself at the center of a conspiratorial maelstrom. Once an ambitious D.A., Clayton is now a shell of his former dynamic self, thanks to a divorce, an unfortunate business venture, and astronomical debt. Though he longs to leave the cutthroat, ethically dubious world of corporate law behind, Clayton's poor financial situation and devotion to firm head Marty Bach (Sydney Pollack) leave him little choice but to remain on the job and tough it out. Meanwhile, litigator Karen Crowder (Tilda Swinton) finds her entire company's future hinging on the outcome of a multi-billion-dollar settlement overseen by Clayton's friend, star lawyer Arthur Edens (Tom Wilkinson). When Edens snaps and decides to blow the whistle on the questionable case, sabotaging the defense, Clayton must decide between his loyalty and his conscience(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Lone Survivor director Peter Berg helmed this docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and the rest of the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival. Kate Hudson, Kurt Russell, and John Malkovich co-star(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mad Max, now a loner, is reluctantly helping a tiny oil-producing community defend itself against band of depraved crazies thirsty for precious fuel(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Tobey Maguire stars in this blockbuster adaptation of the Marvel Comics series. When nerdy high-schooler Peter Parker (Maguire) is bitten by a radioactive arachnid, he's transformed into a web-spinning vigilante who battles the Green Goblin (Willem Dafoe), charms the girl next door (Kirsten Dunst) and infuriates a cigar-chomping newspaper editor (J.K. Simmons). Cliff Robertson, James Franco(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A common thief named Bek enlists the help of powerful god Horus in a quest to defeat Set, an evil god who has plunged a once peaceful Egypt into the darkness. The survival of mankind and the fate of his lover lies in the hands of the unlikely mortal hero(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship Essex struggle for their survival after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Nick Pulovski is a cop, presently assigned to the auto theft division. When he discovers that a man named Strom is the brains behind a major car theft and chop shop ring, he sees this as his opportunity to do something big. After his partner is killed, the case is then transferred to homicide, so he is taken off the case. And he is assigned a new partner, a cop who would prefer to play by the rules(n)

programme.title: The Gene Generation
programme.desc: In a future dystopia where thorough DNA scans are required to gain entrance into every major city, a world-class assassin (Bai Ling) is assigned the task of eliminating rogue DNA hackers. The sun has scorched the earth, and now dense clouds hang above overpopulated megacities. Those whose DNA is considered unworthy are locked out of the cities and forced to wander the wastelands. It's Michelle's duty to ensure that no undesirables gain entry into the city, and she earns a substantial paycheck for doing so(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Astronomer Zane discovers an alien radio signal and when he tries to report it he unearths a sinister conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: A cop tangles with demons and angels when she probes her twin's death with a man who has literally been to hell and back. Supernatural thriller based on the "Hellblazer" graphic novels(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien traveller, Klaatu, heads to Earth along with his bodyguard robot, Gort, to deliver a warning of planetary destruction if the people of the world fail to stop laying waste to the environment(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Director Roger Michell follows up the hit romantic comedy Notting Hill with this thought-provoking thriller. Ben Affleck and Samuel L. Jackson star, respectively, as Gavin Banek and Doyle Gibson, two New York men whose lives become accidentally intertwined in a Good Friday fender bender on the FDR Drive. Late for a crucial appointment, hotshot lawyer Gavin tosses Doyle a blank check and leaves the scene, while Doyle, whose car is inoperable, is late for a court-appointed custody hearing. A recovering alcoholic, Doyle's tardiness doesn't sit well with the judge, who - sick of waiting for Gipson - grants custody to Doyle's ex-wife in Doyle's absence. The situation worsens when it becomes evident that Doyle has an equally important file belonging to Gavin, which proves that an elderly man gave Banek's firm power-of-attorney over his foundation. So begins an escalating war of words and deeds between the two men. Soon, egged on by an associate, Gavin hires a "fixer" to destroy Doyle's credit, forcing Doyle to fire back with some cunning moves of his own(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Al Pacino's gritty performance propels this saga about a former drug lord's efforts to go straight(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Seeking a very personal and mysterious revenge against Detective John McClane, a malevolent genius named Simon is forcing the heroic cop to play a deadly game. The stakes: New York City itself. The game begins when a phone call from Simon sends McClane to Harlem, where he unexpectedly forms an alliance with the very unwilling Zeus Carver. McClane and Zeus soon find themselves careening across the Big Apple, pursuing the deadly Simon, who's always one step ahead of them(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by a ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release(n)

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Siblings (Christina Ricci, Jesse Eisenberg) are bitten by a beast in Los Angeles, then gradually turn into werewolves(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Successful and single businesswoman Kate Holbrook is finally determined to have a kid on her own now that she is 37. But when she discovers that she has only a million-to-one chance of getting pregnant, the driven Kate finds in working girl Angie Ostrowiski an unlikely surrogate. Everything is apparently going well. That until Angie shows up at Kate doorstep with no place to live. The two opposites try to get along and, in the middle of their tug-of-war, they discover that there can be a different kind of family(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Distressed Dining Room. Nicole turns her attention to a kitschy formal dining room decorated in pink and gold colors. On her to-do list: restoring the floors; swapping out sconces; and repairing the stained glass windows(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: In at the Deep End. Nicole takes swimming lessons in between cleaning up the pool of a 1904 mansion. Also: She converts some garage space into a changing area for bathers; and gets more of a mess than she bargained for when she taps into a sewer line(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Living Room Cover Up. Nicole works on restoring the living room and study to their former 1904 glory. Included: She polishes the original woodworking details; stains the damaged floors; and discovers a shocking surprise. Also: The host makes time to attend a women's health charity event(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Brick by Brick Restoration. Nicole turns her attention to the exterior of the mansion, which hasn't been painted since 1972. Included: The outdoor wood railing and detail are rotting and need to be fixed; new brick columns are built; Nicole's son pitches in with the renovations by replacing some of the original beams and running errands around town(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Brightening the Bedrooms. Nicole removes old wallpaper and fixtures as she works on brightening up the upstairs bedrooms and bathroom. Included: She brings out the beauty of original birdseye maple woodwork; restores two fireplaces; and gets rid of any tacky kitsch. Also: She helps raise money for a fallen soldier(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Too Close for Comfort. A family vacation comes to an abrupt end when Nicole learns of burst pipes and a flooded house due to the extreme cold. Included: She and her crew must replace the waterlines, radiators and boiler, as well as patch 20 massive holes. Also: Skydiving and a 10K run offer a much-needed break from Nicole's stress(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict

The dilapidated kitchen is first on their to-do list, and they start by replacing the dingy old cabinets with wood ones. They also install granite countertops and brand new appliances, plus they create an outdoor patio and driveway that can be used to relax and play(n)

programme.title: Rehab Addict

programme.desc: Rupert Penry-Jones stars in this adaptation of John Buchan's classic novel, set in 1914. Engineer Richard Hannay is bored and restless in London - until he meets Scudder, who claims to be a British spy. When the agent is killed in his flat, Hannay is thrown headlong into adventure, forced to go on the run under suspicion of murder. Fleeing to Scotland, with police and spies on his tail, he teams up with feisty suffragette Victoria Sinclair, and although they fail to hit it off, the couple become increasingly reliant on each other as they race to unmask a traitor and save Great Britain from German invasion. Action thriller, co-starring Eddie Marsan and Lydia Leonard.(n)

American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: The night before the wedding, Nick and Winston help Schmidt rewrite his vows, while Jess believes Sam is going to propose to her.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Schmidt makes a last-ditch effort to convince Cece's mom to come to their wedding - but in doing so, he risks missing the ceremony himself.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Though still heartbroken over Sophia, Jake's spirits are lifted when the squad is invited to a Homeland Security counter-terrorism training simulation. Gina performs a psychological test on Holt, while Santiago and Diaz compete for a day off.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When Peralta notices Holt is in a bad mood, he teams up with the captain's husband Kevin to find out what has gone wrong. Boyle tries to get a confession out of an elderly bank-robbery suspect (played by Happy Days creator Garry Marshall), who pretends to be frail and adorable whenever Santiago and Diaz are around.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon discover their favourite childhood TV science show host Professor Proton can be booked for private parties and decide to hire him to entertain them. Meanwhile, Raj asks Howard and Bernadette to look after his dog for the weekend, but the couple panic when the canine goes missing. Guest starring Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys invite the girls to a Dungeons & Dragons night when their trip to Vegas falls through after an incident with airport security. However, following a few drinks, Sheldon and Amy's relationship takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Raj goes on a date with Lucy, who tries to sneak out of the restaurant's bathroom window - but ends up getting stuck and calling for his help.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: A visitor at the hotel intentionally stirs up trouble between Lily and Robin, and also between Ted and Barney. Meanwhile, Marshall and baby Marvin finally arrive at the Farhampton Inn to join the wedding party. American sitcom, guest starring Andrew Rannells.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall tells the gang about his quest to learn the three mighty virtues of speed, strength and accuracy to master the Slap of a Million Exploding Suns - before delivering a devastating blow to Barney. American sitcom, guest starring Boyz II Men.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Julia tells Nick she does not want to put a label on their relationship, leaving him anxious and disappointed, and she also annoys Jess by refusing to help her get out of paying for a parking ticket. Winston tries to impress a former date, while Schmidt is determined to find out why his towel is always damp. Comedy, starring Lizzy Caplan, Jake Johnson and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess decides to mark her first Valentine's Day as a single woman by going on a meaningless date with a stranger and asks Schmidt to help her find a suitable candidate. Nick's romantic plans are ruined when Julia is overwhelmed with work, while Winston gets a second chance to impress Shelby. Guest starring Ryan Kwanten (True Blood) and Clark Duke (Hot Tub Time Machine).(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max, Caroline and the diner gang work together to get Earl back on stage, when his former band are due to perform an anniversary gig at a music club owned by his ex-girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Caroline is jealous when Max reconnects with an old friend, but an invitation to a weekend away with some fresh acquaintances does not turn out as planned.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is dismayed when the group spends the Thanksgiving holiday at Mrs Wolowitz's house, but hits it off with Bernadette's father. Meanwhile, Penny realises she must deal with a mistake from her past when she and Leonard have an argument. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace thinks she knows where Bart is buried, Cindy uses Simone's past against her in the campaign trail, and Darcy manipulates Jesse into asking her to move in. Elsewhere, Courtney finds out that her controlling Grandmother is planning to visit so she decides to go on holiday.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry learn something new about Murray, while Erica's college application has a surprise for Beverly. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of his girlfriend's career decision, Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books, and Howard and Raj provide Amy with some advice. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: Tough cop John McClane arrives at an airport to pick up his wife, but finds himself plunged into a bloody life-or-death struggle. He must battle terrorists who have seized control of the terminal as part of a campaign to secure the release of a convicted drug baron. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero and William Atherton.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Raj take a heartbroken Howard to Las Vegas, where they pay a prostitute to spend time with him. Meanwhile, Sheldon finds himself locked out of his apartment and forced to stay the night at Penny's. With guest star Jodi Lynn O'Keefe (Prison Break).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Stuart takes Penny out for a second date, during which she drunkenly reveals her true feelings. Meanwhile, Howard uncovers a flaw in the toilet he designed for a Nasa space shuttle, and asks his friends to help him correct it before the launch. Kaley Cuoco, Kevin Sussman and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a countdown of the top 50 internet icons who have gained online fame through popular videos, including a rebooted Rambo, singing mormons and Shia LaBeouf.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: The team meets vegan rocker Jhon who, after losing a bet, has come in to get the face of one of his cricket team-mates tattooed on his leg. Sketch is tasked with helping Ryan, who woke up hungover with a horticultural horror on his groin. Meanwhile, Jay deals with a couple who are obsessed with going on holiday and getting cheap tattoos.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A bobsledder for the British Olympic team enjoys life as a bachelor and is uncertain about starting a relationship - but a date with a kickboxer and fellow Olympian might just change his mind. Two other men arrive for their dates with very specific ideas of what they want, leaving the women they meet uncertain whether they want to take the relationship further.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics share their opinions of the week's biggest and best shows, including Alan Carr: Chatty Man, The Murder Detectives, I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, The Hunt, The Supervet, Braveheart and the news headlines. First aired in December 2015.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie sells the table football game to a student fraternity as part of her plan to `baby proof' the apartment, unaware that Ben was using it as a hiding place for Emma's college tuition money. Meanwhile, Riley is not happy that Danny is going out with the sister of her ex-boyfriend. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley decides to travel by train to her family reunion in Florida, so Ben volunteers to tag along, seeing it as the perfect opportunity for them to rekindle their romance. When Tucker gets the chance to co-host a television show, he asks Bonnie for help with his audition tape. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel dates a divorced man whose ex-wife is going out with Joe, and a disagreement arises over custody of the former couple's son. Meanwhile, Lennox is tempted to get a tattoo, and Ryder is surprised to find he misses being in school.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna confides in Farrah about wanting Warren to open up more, and Lisa offers Maxine and Adam the outdoor space at the Loveboat to set up a beach bar. Meanwhile, Prince and Hunter are furious when Shane worms his way back into the McQueen's.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists arrive in the Spanish city of Almeria where another couple join the group. The contestants enjoy an archery lesson and also learn about the traditional art of rug-making, before things become heated at the vote.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam struggles to come to terms with Tiff's infidelity, Lucy hears some unsettling rumours and Rosie encourages Binky to move on from JP.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The precinct goes into lockdown on Thanksgiving when a mysterious powder-filled package is delivered to the building. Peralta, who has been left in charge while Holt and Jeffords are out of the office, is confident he can keep morale high and avoid any chaos - but things soon spiral out of control.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: While attempting to catch a drug dealer, Peralta and Boyle reluctantly join forces with Agent Jack Danger (guest star Ed Helms, the Hangover trilogy), a pompous investigator at the US Postal Inspection Service. Meanwhile, the other officers try to help Santiago conquer her cravings and give up smoking.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe accidentally injures Austin during a game of pool, foiling his plan for a romantic weekend away with Mel. Meanwhile, a home-schooled student begins studying with Ryder, but the new arrangement soon turns sour.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel and Austin have different opinions about whether or not to have children, while Joe is confused when his new girlfriend tell him that she only wants a physical relationship with no other commitments. Plus, Lennox enlists Ryder's help when she struggles to write her college admissions essay. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley decides she would prefer to keep it a secret when she and Ben start dating again. Meanwhile, the family members return to their old neighbourhood to take part in a local party, and Danny considers moving to Paris when Georgie gets a new job there. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben, Danny and Tucker are looking forward to attending the biggest Halloween celebration in the city, despite the fact that Bonnie thinks they should take Emma trick-or-treating instead. When their plans fall through, they decide to gatecrash a party that Riley is attending, not realising that it's actually a hen party and they will soon live to regret their rash decision.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin wins James's ring during a pre-wedding game of poker and refuses to give it back, and Lily coaches Barney on how to handle the emotional stress when he is forced to choose between his bride-to-be and his mother Loretta (Frances Conroy). Meanwhile, Ted and Marshall argue over wedding gifts and whether thank-you cards were sent in the past. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted realises he could take any one of three women to the wedding, but chooses poorly over which to spend time with. Barney and Robin steal Marshall and Lily's story on how they first met after feeling judged about their messy past by the stern minister who is marrying them. Meanwhile, Marshall finds out more about his driving companion Daphne on their long journey. American sitcom, starring Josh Radon and Alyson Hannifin.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess's housemates refuse to lend her any more of their possessions, so she is forced to visit the flat of ex-boyfriend Spencer to retrieve her belongings. She later finds herself giving him and his new girlfriend - the woman he was seeing behind her back - a lift to the airport. Meanwhile, Coach moves out and is replaced by former resident Winston. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel and Lamorne Morris.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: The men are invited to the wedding of a mutual friend, leaving Nick worried he might encounter his ex-girlfriend at the event, so he invites Jess along as his date. At the reception, Schmidt looks for single women, only to meet the overly aggressive Gretchen, with whom he has a complicated relationship, while Winston takes his role as usher seriously and becomes competitive on the dance floor with a guest. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel and Jake Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: As the wedding of Gina's mother and Boyle's father arrives, each member of the squad is given a task to complete for the big day. However, Peralta and Santiago get sidetracked chasing a criminal, and Jeffords struggles to officiate at the ceremony. Comedy, guest starring Sandra Bernhard and Nick Cannon.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake's seldom-seen father Roger arrives to spend some time with his son, but Charles is sceptical of his true motives. Meanwhile, Holt tests Amy, Terry, Gina and Rosa with a near-impossible brain teaser in exchange for tickets to a Beyonce concert. Guest starring Bradley Whitford (The West Wing).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raj pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town conference. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall and Lily decide to put their argument about Marshall accepting a judgeship without discussing it on hold so they can enjoy their reunion. Meanwhile, Robin and Ted finally discover what Barney does for a living when they cross-examine him after he has had too much to drink. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: In a series of flashbacks celebrating the show's 200th episode, it is revealed how Ted first met his future wife, and how they share a history of missed connections, especially after he was introduced to her room-mate Cindy (Rachel Bilson). The couple realise they have had many of the same friends and acquaintances over the years. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess tries to stop one of her pupils picking on a classmate - only to become the new target of the bully's wrath. Schmidt is desperate to brag about his Valentine's Day exploits, but finds his partner is far less keen, while Nick is plunged into despair by a gift from Julia.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick injures his back during a game of touch football, so Jess takes him to see a doctor. However, an initial scan reveals a potentially serious problem, forcing him to take stock of his life. His friends, meanwhile, are unsure what they can do to help.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Caroline tells her riches-to-rags tale at a story-telling event, and ends up getting the attention of a Hollywood executive. Meanwhile, Sophie and Oleg seek a suitable surrogate.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max and Caroline sign up to hand out leaflets to get into a video game convention for free, but once there, they discover a designer has stolen their likenesses for a fantasy game.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is bothered by the attention he receives in the wake of his heavy element discovery, but is taken aback when his work is disproved by Leonard. Meanwhile, Raj makes Howard and Bernadette feel inadequate when he stays with them for a week and is the perfect house guest.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon leaves for Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he is away, the rest of the friends decorate for Christmas and reflect on how much he has changed their lives. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine is sure that Darcy is lying about being homeless and decides to prove it, and Courtney is suspicious about why her Grandmother is being so nice. Meanwhile, Cindy has the opportunity to ruin Simone's political chances.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam attempts to join the tennis team to stay close to a friend, and Beverly helps Erica go through her post-breakup depression. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon cannot contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague Bert has won a prestigious fellowship with an impressive grant. Elsewhere, Howard finds an old remote-controlled toy he made in the past, but the rest of the group do not seemed to be too impressed by it. Stephen Hawking guest stars.(n)

programme.sub-title: I'll Be Home for Christmas - Maybe.
programme.desc: Kevin helps Mott and his children prepare for the festive holidays, allowing Kyle to step in and assist Donna. US comedy, starring Kevin James and Erinn Hayes.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Cece enlists Jess and Reagan to help recruit new models. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, Megan Fox and Hannah Simone.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess and Robby make an unexpected discovery about their relationship. Winston throws a surprise party for Aly, and Schmidt and Cece try to impress their new neighbours.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: With his parents recently divorced, privately educated Will has to move to a new area and make friends at the local comprehensive, where he meets Simon, Jay and Neil. First-ever episode of the comedy, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.desc: The four lads decide to play truant from sixth form and buy alcohol for an all-day drinking session, which is interrupted when Neil's father comes home early. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon wins a grant to pay for a summer expedition to the North Pole, and invites his friends to join him. However, the gang's imminent departure causes Leonard and Penny to reconsider their feelings for each other. Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon returns to Texas in disgrace when he discovers his friends tampered with the Arctic expedition data after growing tired of his quest for a scientific breakthrough. Elsewhere, Leonard becomes frustrated as constant interruptions hamper his attempts to woo Penny.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Conquerors
programme.desc: Documentary examining the success of the fire ant, which has thrived as a result of protecting its territory, confiscating food for itself, and fighting with burning venom.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor grapples with catfish on the Tennessee River, and searches for blackfin tuna drawn to offshore oil production platforms in the Gulf of Mexico. He also tries his hand at the ancient method of bow fishing to catch carp in Nashville - but gets more than he bargained for with the appearance of an alligator gar.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: David Attenborough describes the annual return of half a billion Pacific salmon to the rivers of Canada and Alaska where they were born - and where bears hungrily await them. Every year, the fish travel up to 20,000 miles to spawn and die, swimming upstream and leaping over giant waterfalls as part of an extraordinary natural event that helps sustain the entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Film-makers from the BBC's Natural History Unit and scientists from America's Smithsonian Institution venture into Burma's jungles to catalogue its species in the hope of getting protected status for the area. The team sets out to discover whether the mountains in the west are home to a population of Asian elephants that could prove critical to the survival of the species. Gordon Buchanan and Justine Evans search the valleys and ridges, while biologist Ross Piper follows up rumours of a second herd.(n)

programme.title: Conquerors
programme.desc: Documentary examining the pine processionary caterpillar, which is threatening Europe's forests thanks to its ability to defoliate vast tracts of pines.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor travels to South Africa, where he finds himself in shark-infested waters while paddle skiing. He also catches an octopus and tries his hand at reef fishing in a bid to land a huge salmon.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: The annual migration of wildebeest, gazelles and zebras away from the Serengeti grasslands, and how their departure affects a pride of lions left behind, which struggles to survive without a ready source of prey. Not only do the females have difficulty finding food for their young, but a fire destroys the cover they need to ambush the few animals that remain - and the number of cubs gradually dwindles to just two.(n)

programme.title: Wild China
programme.desc: Examining the heartland of the country, home to ancient structures such as the Great Wall and modern buildings like Beijing's Olympic Stadium, as well as animals including the giant panda and golden snub-nosed monkey. However, the region holds even deeper cultural significance as the land of origin of China's most populous ethnic group the Han people - whose 5,000-year-old traditions are increasingly under threat.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Kadi and her baby Ardhi have escaped danger at Burnt Rock Tower, but being on the run means they have not eaten for a whole day.(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy concerning the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his clients to fend off the acquisitive attentions of a rival bodybuilding empire with designs on their virtually bankrupt facility. To generate much-needed cash, they enter a team in the national dodgeball competition and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team representing their foes(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: Epic historical drama documenting a legal battle over a shipload of slaves who overpowered their captors at sea and landed on the shores of America. Initially, the argument in the courts revolves around the issue of property and ownership. Gradually though, the lawyers for the defence come to understand and appreciate the humanity of the men turned into cargo by the evils of slavery(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A mismatched group of bored suburbanites longing to escape the stress of their daily lives and embrace the freedom of the open road finds that it takes more than polished chrome and leather jackets to truly experience the biker lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Ashley Judd is framed for murdering her husband, but when she learns he is still alive, she resolves to hunt him down. Tommy Lee Jones stars in this slick thriller(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Mossad agent fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist(n)

programme.desc: Ray Peterson's life revolves around his family and washing the car on a Sunday. But this all changes when the Klopeks move in next door. They're never seen and worse still is the noise which comes from the basement(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Donnie Brasco stars Johnny Depp as undercover FBI agent Joe Pistone, who leaves his wife and family to infiltrate the mob as the "jewel man" Donnie Brasco. Donnie maneuvers his way into the confidence of Lefty Ruggiero, an aging hitman who never made it to the big time and sees a new future for himself with this smart young thief. Lefty enlists Donnie as his protégé, but Lefty's friendship and loyalty make it hard for Donnie to distance himself emotionally. As Donnie moves deeper into the Mafia, he realizes he's not only crossing the line between federal agent and criminal, but also leading his friend to an almost certain death sentence(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Tom Cruise plays Cole Trickle, a young hot-shot stock car racer determined to make it as top gun if he can find the right cocktail of car and manager, who comes along in the guise of racing legend Harry Hogge. As the pair tour the circuits, the climax builds up to Daytona and a showdown between Trickle and his arch-rival Russ Wheeler, who will stop at nothing to beat him. Tony Scott's all-action film captures the all-out excitement and speed of the sport, while Nicole Kidman as Dr Claire Lewicki provides the love interest(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: In the eagerly anticipated sequel, directed by Jim Abrahams, Charlie Sheen returns as Topper Harley. Sickened by his life of violence, Topper retreats to a mysterious Eastern monastery. But when he's asked to head a mission to free the Desert Storm PoWs, he takes up arms again. In what is largely a spoof of the Rambo movies, he's joined by Ramada Hayman, who had previously dumped him, but she must also fight the charms of CIA op Michelle Huddleston. When they've finished, the MIddle East will never be the same again..(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A photographer who witnessed his famous mountaineer father's death as a child must face his fears and rescue his sister who is trapped on K2 at 26,000 feet. Feeling responsible for his father's fatal accident, the young man had given up climbing but when his sister and her team become trapped after an avalanche, he must enlist the help of experts in order to save the group(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: A mysterious Tibetan monk and a young street kid become unlikely allies to help protect a powerful, sacred scroll. Sean William Scott stars (2003)(n)

programme.title: Black Dynamite
programme.desc: The city streets explode into violence when "The Man" kills Black Dynamite's (Michael Jai White) brother in this seamless recreation of the blaxploitation classics of the 1970s. He was the best agent that the CIA ever had, but these days Black Dynamite only answers to one boss -- himself. When "The Man" ices Black Dynamite's brother, starts pumping heroin into the local orphanage, and floods the ghetto with a secret weapon disguised as common malt liquor, the car chases, gunfights, and shirtless brawls that follow prove wild enough to make even Dolemite green with envy(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: An undercover cop becomes too close to an Ohio drug lord, ultimately endangering the police operation(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: Living in extreme conditions outside the realm of Water and Power, Tank Girl and her side kick Jet Girl are attacked and taken prisoner by the evil overlord(n)

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: A Chinese government agent arrives in Paris for a secret mission but things go wrong when the man he has come to help betrays him. Jet Li stars(n)

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally run over a stranger and hide the body rather than inform the authorities, only to find themselves stalked the following year by a shadowy figure who takes great delight in disposing of them in a variety of gruesome ways. Horror, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Freddie Prinze Jr and Anne Heche(n)

When "The Man" ices Black Dynamite's brother, starts pumping heroin into the local orphanage, and floods the ghetto with a secret weapon disguised as common malt liquor, the car chases, gunfights, and shirtless brawls that follow prove wild enough to make even Dolemite green with envy(n)

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally run over a stranger and hide the body rather than inform the authorities, only to find themselves stalked the following year by a shadowy figure who takes great delight in disposing of them in a variety of gruesome ways. Horror, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Freddie Prinze Jr and Anne Heche(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: An undercover cop becomes too close to an Ohio drug lord, ultimately endangering the police operation(n)

programme.title: New Jersey Drive
programme.desc: New Jersey Drive opens with Jason (Gabriel Casseus) heading off to juvenile detention then unfolds in flashback as, chronologically, the incidents leading to his arrest surface one by one. First the audience sees his violence and poverty-ridden project; next his go-nowhere delinquent friends are introduced, as is their hobby: joy riding. Soon some of the teens, including Jason, begin to convert their hobby into a part-time job as they steal cars and sell them to a sleazy chop-shop owner for pennies on the dollar. Eventually, luck runs out when they are caught in a police sting; one boy is shot to death by the crooked Officer Roscoe (Saul Stein), who then warns Jason not to tell a soul; however, they continue stealing cars. Meanwhile, Jason beats up a neighborhood acquaintance on the playground for a slight to his sister and finds himself the target of the boy's murder attempts. The action draws to a head as both Roscoe and the vengeful boy close in(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens (Nicholas Braun, Josh Fadem, and Mackenzie Davis) must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace their town previously held. Robbie Pickering directs this horror comedy(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Game Show.

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team are assigned to protect the mayor during a rally about immigration rights. While searching the area, they find the body of a photographer who has been robbed and murdered. The investigation initially seems to point to a homeless man, but when the memory card in the victim's camera is found to have a close-up picture of the killer on it, the team races to prevent an imminent murder.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a girl on an island and discovers the victim had been conducting inquiries into her father's murder. Jane gathers the town residents for a meeting and tells them he knows the killer is among them, but his suspicions are badly received by the locals. Starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.sub-title: Where in the World Is Carmine O'Brien?.
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a police chief, and Lisbon is in for a surprise when her bounty hunter brother Tommy and his daughter turn up unexpectedly. The agent is initially reluctant to have her relatives around, but when Tommy and the CBI's investigations cross paths, the team must plan a whole new strategy to catch the killer.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane suspects a blogger's fascination with serial killers may have led him to commit murder in an attempt to achieve a twisted kind of fame. Unfortunately the FBI takes over the case before he can gather enough evidence to make an arrest, prompting him to try another strategy. Aware that the suspect craves publicity, he arranges for him to appear on a TV talk show. Directed by and starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The murder of a gay man stirs political tension in the city, and Chief Pope tasks Brenda with bringing the killer to justice. However, she also has to contend with internal conflicts in the department, as Taylor undermines her authority and a team member actively works against her.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The daughter of a wealthy family's housekeeper is raped and murdered, and the authorities are quick to point the finger of blame at a known sex offender. However, Brenda is convinced there is more to the case than meets the eye, and struggles to overcome her own beliefs and concoct a logical explanation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A wealthy 80-year-old man who recently married a young stripper is found dead and, when his widow dies of an overdose, all eyes turn to the butler. Despite a lack of support from her colleagues, Brenda decides to investigate the victim's three grown-up children instead.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to gain control of an investigation into the murder of a businessman and is eventually partnered on the case by Fritz. However, she discovers the FBI has ulterior motives, putting their friendship under further strain. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigate when a mysterious, fast-spreading illness strikes children from military families. While Gibbs investigates the cause, Abby and Jimmy partner with the Naval Medical Research Centre in the hope of delivering a cure before the holidays. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb plot is uncovered following a death at a Quantico reunion, and tensions in the squad room cause trouble for Torres and Quinn as they settle into their new jobs.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The TAC team must formulate a new defence strategy after discovering a jury has a subconscious gender bias against a female pilot accused of negligence after a crash.(n)

programme.desc: Peter realises Chris is utterly irresponsible, and tries to rectify matters by getting him a job at the local golf course, hoping he will benefit from being entrusted with regular adult duties. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brian is awarded a prestigious job as a sniffer dog for the Quahog police department, only to suffer the embarrassment of becoming addicted to cocaine and referred to a rehabilitation clinic.(n)

Meanwhile, Francine gets to grips with being left-handed.(n)

programme.sub-title: Stanny Slickers 2: The Legend of Ollie's Gold.
programme.desc: A close encounter with death prompts Stan to put his dream of finding Oliver North's buried treasure into effect, and he heads off in search of fame and fortune. At home, Steve creates a robotic girlfriend, and Hayley turns to body piercing.(n)

programme.sub-title: He's Too Sexy for His Fat.

programme.desc: Peter learns his house on Spooner Street is not officially a part of the United States, and decides to take drastic action - by establishing his own country and declaring war on America.(n)

programme.desc: The Smith family stars in a spoof of classic James Bond films. Stan sets out to stop producer Tearjerker (played by Roger), who has devised a diabolical scheme to make movies so depressing that anyone who watches them will ultimately die of despair.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine feels threatened when her mother-in-law seeks Stan's support after breaking up with her latest boyfriend, so she enlists Roger to solve her meddling relative's romantic woes.(n)

programme.desc: Peter tries to help Meg in her bid to become a reporter for the school newspaper by writing an article falsely claiming actor Luke Perry, who guest stars as himself, is gay. programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and his friends go on an extended drinking binge in a bid to win a tour of the local brewery - but their bad behaviour lands them in trouble with owner Pawtucket Pat, who bears more than a passing resemblance to Willy Wonka. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine encourages Stan to open up emotionally, but gets more than she bargained for when he reveals a dark secret concerning the fate of a neighbour's husband. As the revelations continue to emerge, Roger takes it upon himself to play psychiatrist to the pair.(n)

programme.desc: Stan is asked to smoke out a former KGB agent and is shocked to discover the spy has not only moved in next door, but has also converted Steve into a communist. Meanwhile, Klaus is caught smuggling drugs on his way to France.(n)

programme.desc: A former American football star's assistant dies in a car bomb, which Jane believes was intended for the sportsman, so he sets up a ruse to make the killer believe the attack was successful and the athlete is dead. programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Contraband director Baltasar Kormákur and star Mark Wahlberg reteam for this all-star thriller centered on the fragile alliance between two operatives from rival bureaus, neither of whom realize that the other is working undercover. For the past year, U.S. naval intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Wahlberg) and DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) have been on a covert mission to infiltrate a powerful narcotics syndicate. In the criminal underworld, trust comes in short supply. Stigman and Trench have been forced to work as partners, but continue to eye one another with an air of suspicion. Both men realize their only hope for survival is to stick together, however, after a sensitive mission involving a Mexican drug cartel goes horribly awry. Their identities compromised as their respective agencies deny any knowledge of their existence, Stigman and Trench must now elude capture by the authorities while using their acute criminal know-how to also strike back at the ruthless gangsters who would sooner see them six-feet underground, rather than rotting away behind bars. Bill Paxton, Edward James Olmos, Paula Patton, and James Marsden co-star(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and Chris Pine star in this intense action thriller, the final work to be directed by the late Tony Scott. Veteran railroad employee Frank Barnes has his quarrels with the young, new guy on the job, Will Colson - largely because the younger man is about to replace him. But the two must join forces and race against time when an enormous runaway train carrying toxic chemicals heads their way. If its terminal destination in a city wasn't bad enough, the lethal behemoth is also on the same line as another train, aboard which are 150 children who are returning from a school trip. When the railroad company's chairman refuses to take action for financial reasons, Frank takes it upon himself to save the day, despite the seemingly suicidal nature of the mission and the devastating consequences it's likely to have for his loved ones. Will opposes Frank's ridiculously dangerous idea, but joins him anyway. Can the two men patch up their differences and save the day? In addition to the nail-biting action, the score beautifully highlights the suspense, and earned the film a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Sound Editing(n)

Second World War adventure, starring Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield, Jeanne Moreau and Michel Simon.(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game

Starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Predators

programme.title: Stories We Tell
programme.desc: Documentary in which film-maker Sarah Polley examines conflicting accounts of her family's history. She talks to various relatives, who each provide their account of key events, and reveals how they complement and contradict one another - and what this reveals about the concept of family and how people are shaped by such narratives.(n)

programme.title: Magnificent Obsession

programme.desc: The legendary sleuth and his faithful sidekick Dr Watson hunt for the killer of an aristocrat who hired them to keep a priceless diamond out of the hands of thieves. Mystery, starring Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce, Alan Mowbray, Dennis Hoey and Mary Forbes.(n)

programme.title: The Odessa File
programme.desc: The detailed diaries of a former inmate of a concentration camp fall into the hands of an investigative journalist. Incensed by what he reads, he embarks on a crusade to discover the prison commandant's new identity and expose his crimes to the world. In the process, the trail leads him to a secret organisation that helped Nazi SS officers escape justice. Thriller, based on Frederick Forsyth's novel, starring Jon Voight, Derek Jacobi and siblings Maria and Maximilian Schell.(n)

programme.title: The Gunfighter
programme.desc: Gunslinger Jimmy Ringo looks forward to a life of domestic peace after being given a chance to settle down with his once estranged wife and their child. However, a young upstart with dreams of slaying a legend challenges Ringo to a gunfight but dies, setting his three vengeful brothers on the older man's trail. Western, starring Gregory Peck, Millard Mitchell, Karl Malden and Helen Westcott.(n)

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: A TV producer fired from a news station takes over running an early morning TV show which is on the brink of cancellation. She tries to revive its flagging fortunes by hiring a foul-tempered veteran news reporter as the new host, only to find he and his co-presenter loathe each other. Comedy, with Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The Earth is bombarded by what appear to be meteors, but turn out to be the vanguard of an alien invasion force. As America's west coast comes under heavy attack, a platoon of soldiers is sent in to fight off the aliens and rescue civilians - but the troops have only a few hours to complete their mission before the area is bombed. Sci-fi thriller, with Aaron Eckhart and Ramon Rodriguez.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten cooks with Grand Pellegrino for the famous Rao's restaurant, and finds out the best kitchens in America.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: PC Habib finds herself in demand from all sides - Inspector Fowler invites her to join his pub quiz team and DI Grim wants to use her as scantily clad bait in a police operation. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson and Mina Anwar.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: When Tim's boss visits he feels sure that promotion is on the cards, but talk focuses on his early retirement.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean begins to think that, 19 months after tying the knot, her marriage may have become stale. She wonders whether a few surprises from Lionel would spice things up, so Alistair, helped by Judith and Sandy, comes up with a plan to give her the treat of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor and Margaret set off for a break by the seaside - but the discovery of a dead gull in their boarding-house bathroom sets the scene for what turns out to be a weekend of sheer hell. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Who's That with Barry and Glenda?.
programme.desc: Truly jumps to the conclusion that Barry is up to no good after he is spotted acting suspiciously, but his real motive for being in the woods with a suitcase is unfathomable. Long-running comedy, staring Mike Grady, Frank Thornton and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg, Truly and Alvin take a group of pensioners to a farm for the day, but their act of charity backfires when it becomes clear the elderly daytrippers are not happy with the idea.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Barry Becomes a Psychopathic Killer but Only Part-Time.
programme.desc: Smiler finds himself pursued by a wanton gold-digger who thinks he's rich, but luckily Truly is full of ideas to solve the problem. Stephen Lewis and Frank Thornton star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletch plans to bring a bit of Christmas spirit to Slade Prison in the form of his own home-made booze. But when Mackay and Barraclough uncover the stash in his cell, the crafty con seems in danger of spending the yuletide period in solitary confinement. Festive edition of the classic comedy from 1976, starring Ronnie Barker and Fulton Mackay.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville decides a fashion makeover is needed to impress Stephanie from the local boutique, but Arkwright's meddling soon puts paid to any romantic dalliance. Roy Clarke's classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
